author: Laura Vozzella
title: Entrepreneur starts fund to help Va. businesses until federal aid arrives - The Washington Post
description: Pete Snyder, a potential contender for governor in 2021, and his wife have provided $100,000 in seed money.
content:
The fund will provide up to $3,000 to each approved small business. Recipients do not have to repay the money, but if they eventually are in a position to do so, it will be directed to another qualified business.
Snyder said business and philanthropic leader… [+1994 chars]
